title: Convert YouTube Video to Blog Post
description: Generate a blog post from a YouTube video transcript
prompt: Get the transcript from this youtube video [link to video]. Then, summarize it into a blog post.
example:
This will:
1. Extract the transcript from the provided YouTube video
2. Analyze the content
3. Generate a well-structured blog post with:
   - An engaging title
   - Key points from the video
   - Main takeaways
   - Proper formatting and structure
author: GooseAI Team

video_url.description: The URL of the YouTube video to transcribe
